thread.title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rita Johnson, Real Estate Agent at Tarbell Realtors, Into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle
thread.title_full: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rita Johnson, Real Estate Agent at Tarbell Realtors, Into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle

author: Lisa Mancuso
title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Rita Johnson, Real Estate Agent at Tarbell Realtors, Into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle
text:
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Rita M. Johnson as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in real estate. NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters. “It gives me great pleasure to present Rita with this honor for the important work she is doing for the prospective residents of Riverside County,” said Star Jones. “She has created a valuable business enterprise for her community.”
With her deep roots in the civic and economic life of her community, Rita Johnson is building Tarbell Realtors reputation for outstanding value and utmost customer satisfaction upon the interpersonal relationships that are at the heart of her business success and her civic legacy. With her extensive background in marketing and client relations, she provides insightful, multi-disciplinary analysis of an ever-changing economy and society.
Ms. Johnson provides vital support and guidance in providing both sellers and buyers with an enjoyable home selling experience. She has made it her mission to “help customers meet their real estate objectives,” and “work tirelessly on the customer’s behalf,” she said.
Determined to set her career goals on par with her highest aspirations of personal and professional fulfillment, Ms. Johnson promises to “negotiate the best possible deal for my clients with each and every real estate transaction. Nothing satisfies me more than seeing the smiles that come with a successful real estate transaction.” Her personal standards of excellence is what has earned Ms. Johnson this recognition from the NAPW, honoring her as a peer of women who have established themselves as leaders and mentors in their professions.
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive networking forum to successful professional women where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, tools and benefits, members interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
Awards & Accomplishments: Involved with California Association of Realtors and Southwest Riverside County Association of Realtors
